python-psycopg2Â¶

Component Tested version(s)
Psycopg2 2.4.2

Django and, by extension, GMN, accesses PostgreSQL via a Python adapter called Psycopg2.

Install psycopg2:

$ sudo apt-get install python-psycopg2

See the Troubleshooting section if the version of Psycopg2 installed by default causes “can’t adapt” errors.
